title: My Journey
description: I'm a passionate Software Engineer with expertise in software development mainly in backend development, dedicated to delivering value through technology. Currently pursuing my Bachelor of Information System at Muhammadiyah Sarolangun Institute of Technology and Business.
thesis: My research focuses on driving digital transformation at PT Arisamandiri by developing an e-learning platform to support training, manage training workflows, and generate comprehensive reports through a web-based system. I specialize in software engineering with hands-on experience in various programming languages and frameworks.
